description: Alec Forshaw, conservationist, historian and author, will lead a circular walk around Smithfield's back streets.

events.name: A walk round the back streets of Smithfield

factsheet.heading: A walk round the back streets of Smithfield
paragraphs: Alec Forshaw, conservationist, historian and author, will lead a circular walk around Smithfield's back streets to look at three of the great religious institutions that grew up on the 'smooth field' outside the medieval City walls, close to the meat market - the Priories of St Bartholomew and St John, and The Charterhouse - all with extraordinary histories and wonderful surviving buildings. Start and finish in the Grand Avenue of Smithfield Market, lasting around 45 minutes.

location.address: Smithfield Rotunda Garden, West Smithfield, EC1A 9PT

name: Bartholomew Fayre: Smithfield Backstreets Walking Tour
